name: Generic DCAT profile
abstract: Provides a CI/CT/CD environment for the GeoDCAT definition.
description:
## GeoDCAT 

This building block provides a testing framework for the GeoDCAT standard.

Using this building block allows inheritance of any constraints and tests defined for GeoDCAT.

Mainly this

examples.content: This example is a GEODCAT example showing only defined elements
